peopleAlsoAsk.question: How big is 5grams of gold?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The gold bar of 5 grams has a size of 17.7 x 33.1 x 0.6 millimeters. This can vary a few millimeters per producer, but the weight of 5 grams of pure gold is the same for every product.
